title.description: The title of the blog post.

content.description: The main body content of the blog post.

authorId.description: The ID of the user who wrote the post.

publicationDate.description: The date the post was published.

lastModifiedDate.description: The date the post was last modified.

tags.description: A list of tags for the blog post.

imageUrl.description: URL of the image associated with the blog post.

url.description: URL of the original blog post (e.g., on Medium).

/blogPosts/{blogPostId}.description: Collection to store all blog posts.
